General.Name: Wag! Group Co.
General.Description: Wag! Group Co., together with its subsidiaries, develops and supports a proprietary marketplace technology platform available as a website and mobile app that enables independent pet caregivers to connect with pet parents. Its platform allows pet parents, who require specific pet care services, such as dog walking, pet sitting and boarding, advice from licensed pet experts, home visits, training, and pet insurance comparison tools. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 2261 Market Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94114
